actors: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
shortDescription: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.
title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
writers: Leigh Brackett, Lawrence Kasdan, George Lucas

actors: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
shortDescription: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
title: The Matrix

actors: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
shortDescription: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.
title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope

actors: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson
shortDescription: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.
title: Back to the Future

actors: Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, John Hurt
shortDescription: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.
title: Alien

actors: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman
shortDescription: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
writers: Lawrence Kasdan, George Lucas, Philip Kaufman

actors: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young
shortDescription: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.
title: Blade Runner
writers: Hampton Fancher, David Webb Peoples, Philip K. Dick

actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn
shortDescription: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.
title: The Terminator
writers: James Cameron, Gale Anne Hurd, William Wisher

actors: Cary Elwes, Mandy Patinkin, Robin Wright
shortDescription: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.
title: The Princess Bride

actors: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley
shortDescription: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.
title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
writers: Gene Roddenberry, Jack B. Sowards, Harve Bennett

actors: Ryan Gosling, Emily Blunt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson
shortDescription: A stuntman on the brink of career collapse must track down the missing star of his ex-girlfriend's film.
title: The Fall Guy

actors: Brian Cox, Miranda Otto, Lorraine Ashbourne
shortDescription: The story of Helm Hammerhand, the King of Rohan, and the origins of Helm's Deep.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim

shortDescription: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.
title: Batman Begins

actors: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Gary Oldman, Morgan Freeman
shortDescription: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.
title: The Dark Knight
writers: Jonathan Nolan, Christopher Nolan, David S. Goyer

actors: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Gary Oldman, Anne Hathaway, Tom Hardy, Marion Cotillard, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Morgan Freeman
shortDescription: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Selina, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City, now on the edge of total annihilation, from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.
title: The Dark Knight Rises
writers: Jonathan Nolan, Christopher Nolan, David S. Goyer

actors: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang, Michelle Rodriguez
shortDescription: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
title: Avatar

shortDescription: A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.
title: Venom

actors: Chris Evans, Hayley Atwell, Sebastian Stan, Tommy Lee Jones, Hugo Weaving
shortDescription: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum." But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.
title: Captain America: The First Avenger

actors: Edward Norton, Liv Tyler, Tim Roth, William Hurt, Tim Blake Nelson
shortDescription: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper. However, Banner must fight a soldier who unleashes himself as a threat stronger than he.
title: The Incredible Hulk

actors: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe, James Franco, Cliff Robertson, Rosemary Harris
shortDescription: After being bitten by a genetically altered spider, nerdy high school student Peter Parker is endowed with amazing powers to become the Amazing superhero known as Spider-Man.
title: Spider-Man
